nappo.schemes.workers_2daca package¶

nappo.schemes.workers_2daca.cg_worker module¶

nappo.schemes.workers_2daca.cg_worker_set module¶

nappo.schemes.workers_2daca.u_worker module¶

class nappo.schemes.workers_2daca.u_worker.UWorker(grad_workers)¶

Bases: object

Update worker. Handles actor_critic updates.

This worker receives gradients from gradient workers and then updates the its actor_critic model. Updated weights are asynchronously sent back to gradient workers.

grad_workersWorkerSet

Set of workers computing and sending gradients to the UWorker.

num_updatesint

Number of times the actor_critic model has been updated.

grad_workersWorkerSet

Set of workers computing and sending gradients to the UWorker.

adjust_algo_parameter(parameter_name, new_parameter_value)¶

If parameter_name is an attribute of Worker.algo, change its value to new_parameter_value value.

parameter_namestr

Algorithm attribute name

save_model(fname)¶

Save current version of actor_critic as a torch loadable checkpoint.

fnamestr

Filename given to the checkpoint.

save_namestr

Path to saved file.

step()¶

Takes a logical asynchronous optimization step.

infodict

Summary dict of relevant information about the update process.

stop()¶

Stop remote workers
